name: app/__tests__/Button-test.js
app/__tests__/DataTable-test.js
app/__tests__/Header-test.js
app/__tests__/Pagination-test.js

app/components/App/index.js
App
description: App is the main component that contains other parts of the application.

name: constructor
description: constructor

name: state
description:
The main App state  
it holds the payments & pagination data from the API

properties.name: state.payments
properties.description: is a list of returned payments from the API

name: changeRoute
description: Maps the router route to the API calls

name: handleError
description: Handles error when getting data from API

name: setPayments
description:
Handles the success response when getting data from API  
It sets the state of the payments & pagination

name: render
description: Render the App component

return.description: returns whole application with all components

name: app/components/Button/index.js
Button
description: Component for creating buttons
examples:
<caption>Button with different styles & custom href attr</caption>
<Button href="#custom-path" type="action">Bar</Button>
NOTE:
The button type should point to an existing class in Button.css styles  
Type "action" will point to ".action" selector

name: render
description: Render the button to HTML

name: app/components/DataTable/Row/index.js
Row
description: Represents single row in the {@link DataTable} component

name: constructor
description: constructor

name: state
description: The single row state holds info about modal

properties.name: state.modal
properties.description: determines if we should show/hide modal

name: openModal
description: Handles the open modal action (set state.modal to true)

name: closeModal
description: Handles the close modal action (set state.modal to false)

name: render
description: Render the single row for DataTable

name: app/components/DataTable/index.js
DataTable
description: DataTable creates table with rows of payments

name: render
description: Returns a data table with payments

name: app/components/Filter/index.js
Filter
description: Creates a select component for filter the pound rating

name: handleChange
description: Handles the change of the select

name: createOptionNodes
description: Funciton for creating options for the select

name: render
description: Render the select filter

name: app/components/Header/index.js
Header
description: Header component

name: render
description: Renders a header with title and leading text

name: app/components/Pagination/index.js
Pagination
description:
Pagination component  
It's used to generate pagination items.   
We are using {@link Button} component as pagination elements.

name: createPaginationArrow
description: Creates pagination arrow button

name: createPaginationItems
description: Creates the pagination buttons

name: render
description: Renders pagination if there are at least 2 pages of results

name: app/components/Rating/index.js
Rating
description: Rating - component for creating rating icons

name: render
description: Render rating icons + a render text value that could be used in a RWD mode

name: app/components/Root.js
Root
description:
Root wraps the {@link App} component with a router  
We Render this component to the HTML to #app-view

return.description: returns app wrapped with a router

name: app/components/Search/index.js
Search
description: Search - component for filtering results by query

name: handleChange
description: Handles the input change + sets the parent state

name: handleKeyDown
description: Handles the keypress on input + sends filter on ENTER

name: render
description: Renders search input for filtering results by query

name: app/components/Toolbar/index.js
Toolbar
description: Toolbar component is used to filter the {@link DataTable} results

name: constructor
description: constructor

name: state
description: Hold the filtering state

name: componentWillMount
description: Set filters to filters from URL (if any)

name: reset
description: Handler for the reset click

name: filter
description: Filter the results

name: handleSearch
description: Handle the search click

name: render
description: Renders a toolbar for filtering results

name: app/index.js
